name: Initialize Colors
func:
// Tip: to have a smoother effect you should set the transition time in the RGBW2 node to 300ms
// This depends on the interval in the inject node which is set actually to 300ms.
var rgbwValues = [
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 100, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 90, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 80, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 60, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 40, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 20, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 10, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 10, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 10, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 20, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 40, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 60, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 80, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 90, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 100, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 100, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 100, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 100, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 100, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 100, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 100, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 100, effect: 0},
    {mode : "color", red : 255, green : 0, blue : 0, on : true, timer : 0, white : 0, gain: 100, effect: 0},
];
flow.set("rgbwValues", rgbwValues);
flow.set("rgbwValuesIndex", 0);
return msg;

name: Loop Colors
